options.content: ${__from:date:YYYY-MM} COST

targets.query: SELECT LAST("total_cost") FROM "monthly_cost" WHERE ("subscription_id"::tag = '$Subscription') AND time > now() - 24h

SELECT "subscription_id", "total_cost" FROM "monthly_cost" WHERE ("subscription_id"::tag = '4b0a5f96-43b7-4e90-9dc7-223cfa72c86b' OR "subscription_id"::tag = '5fbbb1e7-7f66-4904-ba32-dbf0a40f224f' OR "subscription_id"::tag = 'bcab936a-2388-454c-b309-1aca8620a15d' OR "subscription_id"::tag = 'ea01e5db-cabf-403f-9cc2-a6abf0d25f7b' OR "subscription_id"::tag = '5d98fd4c-bf45-4fe6-a554-68c369997297') AND time > now() - 24h

azureResourceGraph.query:
resourcecontainers
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"
| project subscriptionName = tostring(name), subscription_id = tostring(subscriptionId)

options.content: COMPUTE
NETWORK
DATABASE

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines" or type =~ "microsoft.web/sites" or type =~ "microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters"
| project VM = countof(type,"microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"), Webapp = countof(type,"microsoft.web/sites"), AKS = countof(type,"microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters")

options.content: Status
부하 분산 장치

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type in ( 
    "microsoft.dbforpostgresql/servers",
    "microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers",
    "microsoft.cache/redis",
    "microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts",
    "microsoft.dbformysql/servers",
    "microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers",
    "Microsoft.Sql/servers")
| summarize count() by type
| order by type asc

options.content: Status

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines" // VM 리소스만 필터링
| extend vmState = tostring(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.code) // VM 상태 추출
| where vmState == "PowerState/running" // 실행 중인 VM만 필터링
| summarize runningVMs = count()

Resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines" // VM 리소스만 필터링
| extend vmState = tostring(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.code) // VM 상태 추출
| where vmState == "PowerState/deallocated" // 중지된 VM만 필터링
| summarize stoppedVMs = count()

Resources
| where type == "microsoft.web/sites" // Web App 리소스 필터링
| extend deletionTime = todatetime(properties.deletionTimestamp) // 삭제 시간 추출
| summarize 
    runningWebApps = countif(properties.state == "Running"), // 실행 중인 Web Apps 수
    stoppedWebApps = countif(properties.state != "Running") // 중지된 Web Apps 수

Resources
| where type == "microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters"
| extend powerState = tostring(properties.powerState.code)
| summarize 
    runningAKSCount = countif(powerState == "Running"),
    stoppedAKSCount = countif(powerState == "Stopped")
| mv-expand state = pack_array("Running AKS", "Stopped AKS"), 
                    value = pack_array(runningAKSCount, stoppedAKSCount)

Resources
| where type == "microsoft.cache/redis" // Redis Cache 리소스 필터링
| extend cacheState = tostring(properties.provisioningState) // 캐시 상태 추출
| where cacheState == "Succeeded" or cacheState == "Stopped" // 상태 필터링
| project succeededRedisCaches = countof(cacheState,"Succeeded"), stoppedRedisCaches = countof(cacheState,"stopped")

Resources
| where type in ("microsoft.dbforpostgresql/servers", "microsoft.dbforpostgresql/flexibleservers") // PostgreSQL 리소스 필터링
| extend serverState = tostring(properties.state) // 서버 상태 추출
| where serverState == "Ready" or serverState == "Stopped"
| project readyPostgreSQLServers = countof(serverState,"Ready"), stoppedPostgreSQLServers= countof(serverState,"Stopped")

Resources
| where type == "microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts" // Cosmos DB 계정 리소스 필터링
| extend accountState = tostring(properties.provisioningState) // 계정 상태 추출
| where accountState == "Succeeded" or accountState == "Stopped" 
| project succeededAccounts = countof(accountState,"Succeeded"), stoppedAccounts = countof(accountState,"stopped")

options.content: 생성 / 삭제 (24시간)
VPN

panels.description: 24시간 이내 생성 및 삭제된  VM 수

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/virtualMachines" // VMSS 내 VM 인스턴스 필터링
| extend creationTime = todatetime(properties.timeCreated) // 생성 시간 추출
| extend deletionTime = todatetime(properties.deletionTimestamp) // 삭제 시간 추출
| summarize 
    createdVMCount = countif(creationTime > ago(24h)), // 최근 24시간 내 생성된 VM 수
    deletedVMCount = countif(deletionTime > ago(24h)) // 최근 24시간 내 삭제된 VM 수

panels.title: VM

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.Web/sites" // Web App 리소스 필터링
| extend creationTime = todatetime(properties.createdTime) // 생성 시간 추출
| extend deletionTime = todatetime(properties.deletionTimestamp) // 삭제 시간 추출
| summarize 
    createdWebAppCount = countif(creationTime > ago(24h)), // 최근 24시간 내 생성된 Web App 수
    deletedWebAppCount = countif(deletionTime > ago(24h)) // 최근 24시간 내 삭제된 Web App 수

Resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters" // AKS 리소스 필터링
| extend creationTime = todatetime(properties.createdTime) // 생성 시간 추출
| extend deletionTime = todatetime(properties.deletionTimestamp) // 삭제 시간 추출
| summarize 
    createdAKSCount = countif(creationTime > ago(24h)), // 최근 24시간 내 생성된 AKS 클러스터 수
    deletedAKSCount = countif(deletionTime > ago(24h)) // 최근 24시간 내 삭제된 AKS 클러스터 수

resources
| where type contains "Microsoft.Network/connections" and name =~ "sy-vpn-ai-s2s"
| parse properties.virtualNetworkGateway1.id with * "/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworkGateways/" VNG_Name
| parse properties.localNetworkGateway2.id with * "/Microsoft.Network/localNetworkGateways/" LNG_Name
| project name, Status=tostring(properties.connectionStatus)

Resources
| where type in ("microsoft.dbformysql/servers", "microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers") // MySQL 리소스 필터링
| extend serverState = tostring(properties.state) // 서버 상태 추출
| where serverState == "Ready" or serverState == "Stopped" 
| project readyMySQLServers = countof(serverState,"Ready"), stoppedMySQLServers = countof(serverState,"Stopped")

Resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.Sql/servers" // Microsoft SQL 서버 리소스 필터링
| extend serverState = tostring(properties.state) // 서버 상태 추출
| where serverState == "Ready" or serverState == "Stopped" // 상태 필터링
| project readySQLServers = countof(serverState,"Ready"), stoppedSQLServers = countof(serverState,"Stoppped")

Resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.Sql/servers/databases" // Microsoft SQL 데이터베이스 리소스 필터링
| extend databaseState = tostring(properties.status) // 데이터베이스 상태 추출
| where databaseState == "Online" or  databaseState == "Paused"// 상태 필터링
| project onlineDatabases = countof(databaseState, "Online"),  pausedDatabases = countof(databaseState, "paused")
